actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should do everything possible to expedite the return to the United States from the Soviet Union of John Jodwalis and Lorraine Jodwalis Vaicekauskiene.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the President should do everything possible to expedite the return of John Jodwalis and Lorraine Jodwalis Vaicekauskiene to the United States from the Soviet Union.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President should do everything possible to expedite the return to the United States from the Soviet Union of John Jodwalis and Lorraine Jodwalis Vaicekauskiene.
